Tender Title: CPU 2317 Dangerous Structures Out of Hours Consultancy Services
Tender Description:
Nottingham City Council is seeking tenders from suitably experienced and qualified entities for the provision of consultancy services.Dangerous Structures Out of Hours Consultancy Services out of office hours Dangerous Structures inspection, reporting and response service.
The service is to operate from 4:30pm to 8:30am Monday to Friday and for 24 hours on Saturdays, Sundays, Bank and other statutory holidays, and on other rare occasions as required by the Council.
Attendance on site is required within one hour of the provider receiving a telephone call and covers call-out to any structures within the boundary of the City of Nottingham.
